description: Erection of a single-storey side/rear extension; installation of window in side elevation of outrigger at first-floor level (AMENDED)
decision_conditions:
<p>Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &amp; maintenance plan (where
applicable) of at least one suitable sustainable drainage system (i.e. water butt with overflow, raingarden, bioretention
planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving etc.) shall be
submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway
rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It
must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall
reduction in peak flow rate and volume.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure the development is considered acceptable in regard to drainage and to mitigate against the effects of surface water flooding.</p>

<p>The window hereby approved in the side elevation of the outrigger feature at first-floor level shall be obscure-glazed.&nbsp;</p><p>

REASON: To ensure there is no significant or detrimental impact in regard to neighbouringn amenity.</p>

<p>The ground-floor extension hereby approved shall match the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance.

</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure the development has a satisfactory appearance and appears in keeping with the character of the surrounding area.</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
